abstract.t: This document specifies a method for encapsulating and transmitting IPv4/IPv6 and Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) packets over InfiniBand (IB). It describes the link layer address to be used when resolving the IP addresses in 'IP over InfiniBand (IPoIB)' subnets. The document also describes the mapping from IP multicast addresse to InfiniBand multicast addresses. Additionally this document defines the setup and configuration of IPoIB links.
